title: Not Helvetica...what is it?
content: Hi Type lovers...what is this font? I like its clean modern look a bit better than helvetica or Univers...Does anyone know what it is?
author: MissDaisy

comments.content: [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416042028/http:/www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova). (It alays helps in these cases to link to the website the image is from, it's definitely a common enough font to figure out anyway, but a wefont takes less than a second to figure out with the [WhatFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416042028/http:/chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html) plugin.)

If you are interested in contemporary alternatives to Helvetica and Univers, there are quite a few “Swiss” grotesques shown in Jan Middendorp’s _Type Navigator_, a survey/specimen of independent foundry work.  
 [http://www.amazon.ca/Type-Navigator-Independent-Foundries-Handbook/dp/38...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416042028/http:/www.amazon.ca/Type-Navigator-Independent-Foundries-Handbook/dp/3899553772 "http://www.amazon.ca/Type-Navigator-Independent-Foundries-Handbook/dp/3899553772")
Thank you for the tips!!! I am new to this and really appreciate the help!

IIRC Stephen Coles prepared a number of “alternatives to” lists for FontShop, including one for Helvetica:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fontlist/alternatives/helvetica\_alternatives/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416042028/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/alternatives/helvetica_alternatives/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fontlist/alternatives/helvetica\_alternatives/")
Thank Owen! I appreciate this and definitely try it!
I LOVE THIS PLUG IN!!!!! THANKS!
